tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competitors_social_media_data (
  competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
  social_media_platform VARCHAR(50),
  post_content TEXT,
  post_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
  social_media_platform VARCHAR(50),
  post_content TEXT,
  post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  sentiment_score DECIMAL,
  engagement_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    shares_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_engagement (
    engagement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_id UUID,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (competitor_id) REFERENCES competitors_activity(competitor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    sentiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES competitors_activity(competitor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_id UUID,
    engagement_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    performance_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (competitor_id) REFERENCES competitors_activity(competitor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Social_Media_Accounts (
    account_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    follower_count INT,
    post_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE,
    account_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Social_Media_Accounts(account_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_text TEXT,
    post_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Likes (
    like_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    account_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Social_Media_Accounts(account_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Hashtags (
    hashtag_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hashtag_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)
